document_data.mainbody:
omir was a Calishite human bounty hunter active in 1357 DR.
He was one of a trio of bounty hunters hired by Baron Abon Duum of Manshaka to recover or slay the escaped slave-gladiator Vajra Valmeyjar. In 1357 DR, they went to the Sel√ªnes Smile in Waterdeep and used a poison dart and a club to subdue Vajra and kidnap her, though even beaten and drugged she put up a fight.
Conner, Timoth Eyesbright, and Salabak eventually caught up with the band, distracted them with the illusion of a dracolich, and slew them with arrows, rescuing Vajra.
